abstract: Analytical reviews on the level of evidence presented in publications. This report specifically covers the following publications: pmid33141331, pmid33122618, pmid33080002, pmid33104195, pmid33135582, pmid33141332, pmid33143712, pmid33105071, pmid33154179, pmid33137167, pmid33141443, pmid33152090, pmid33135804, pmid33141358, pmid33135382, pmid33113246, pmid33152797
name: Covid-19 LST Report 2020.11.10

isBasedOn.name: First results of investigations of SARS-CoV-2 RNA in human corneal tissue.
Protection at the Frontlines: Rapid Organization and Delivery of COVID-19 Personal Protective Equipment Training.
Association Between Early Treatment With Tocilizumab and Mortality Among Critically Ill Patients With COVID-19.
Best Practices for COVID-19-Positive or Exposed Mothers-Breastfeeding and Pumping Milk.
Why Severe COVID-19 Patients Are at Greater Risk of Developing Depression: A Molecular Perspective.
What is the significance of the conjunctiva as a potential transmission route for SARS-CoV-2 infections?
At what times during infection is SARS-CoV-2 detectable and no longer detectable using RT-PCR-based tests? A systematic review of individual participant data.
Airborne transmission of SARS-CoV-2 via aerosols.
Characteristics and outcomes of COVID-19 associated stroke: a UK multicentre case-control study.
Clinical impact of monocyte distribution width and neutrophil-to-lymphocyte ratio for distinguishing COVID-19 and influenza from other upper respiratory tract infections: A pilot study.
Dermatologic manifestations of COVID-19: a comprehensive systematic review.
Assessing the potential association between SARS-CoV-2 RNA load in the respiratory tract and COVID-19 mortality.
A comprehensive review on promising anti-viral therapeutic candidates identified against main protease from SARS-CoV-2 through various computational methods.
